content.first: Oh and fun! making change should also be fun and easy. That way as many people as possible want to join in!
content.third: The time for waiting for others to fix this planet is over. Modern technology allows us to coordinate action and share great ideas for change in a way never before possible
content.fourth: While each action may feel like a tiny ripple. As more and more people join in the effects multiply, combining to form an unstoppable wave, a Positive Action Movement which can sweep across this planet
content.fifth: Our message is that YOU have the power to change the world around you, and our mission is to give you the tools to create that positive change

content.first: Print the map as a valuable guide to give those on the streets, helping them access resources to improve and change their situation
content.second: The helpless feeling of walking past people who are sleeping on the streets, wanting to help but not knowing what you can do. That changes today!
content.third: Browse suggestions for things you can offer on the map to support people struggling nearby, like;
content.fourth: CV/resume building help. Teach a skill. An intro, old books and advice on starting in your profession. Or simply a cup of tea, or a meal to share a friendly chat and some normality
content.fifth: Post free resources you find onto the map. suit hire for interviews. shelters or religious buildings offering showers. support groups. pass it on coffee. where to find free food
